contractStructure.name: string - Contract or interface name
contractStructure.path: string - Relative path from contracts/ directory
contractStructure.description: string|null - Combined title, notice, and dev comments
contractStructure.context: string - Primary context/category based on tags
contractStructure.theme: string - Hex color for UI theming
contractStructure.originAddresses: object - Origin chain addresses for cross-chain operations
contractStructure.functionSignatures: array - Parsed function signatures from ABI
contractStructure.hasAddresses: boolean - Whether contract has any network addresses
contractStructure.hasOriginAddresses: boolean - Whether contract has origin addresses
contractStructure.functionCount: number - Number of functions in ABI
